pages.title: Reversing Hoe
pages.text: This tool can be used to reverse the state of certain blocks. $(br2)See the next page for further details.
Using Stable Ingots will yield a special enchantment.

pages.title: Crops
pages.text: Any crop that is clicked with this hoe will regress it to a previous state. $(br2)The crop must have the $(br)'forge:crops' tag for this to work.
